name: Hyperloop Technology, Inc.
goal: Our goal is to make Hyperloop transportation a reality. Hyperloop would be an energy-elegant, safe, and rapid transportation system.
euInitiatives:
Transportation
Passenger systems
Cargo systems

Hyperloop One is not currently following any specific EU initiatives, policies, or legislative files. We are registering with the EU Transparency Register to continue meeting with European Union policy makers to introduce them to Hyperloop One as the world's newest form of transportation. We will update our Transparency Register if and when Hyperloop one starts following specific initiatives, policies, and/or legislative files.
